original_title: Beh name shahrzad Ia Avalin baaghe abjo dar tehran
overview: Forget everything you think you know about storytelling! And get ready for a very surreal trip. Narges Kalhor plunges us in a funny and deconstructed joyful apocalypse of a web of stories while following four characters who moved to Germany in order to escape the dire and dangerous political situation of their countries.
title: In The Name Of Scheherazade Or The First Beergarden In Tehran
